1 /*
2  * PID controller for the AR.Drone.
3  *
4  * For further details see Camera-Based Navigation of a Low-Cost Quadrocopter (J. Engel, J. Sturm, D. Cremers)
5  * In Proc. of the International Conference on Intelligent Robot Systems (IROS), 2012.
6  *
7  * and
8  *
9  * Accurate Figure Flying with a Quadrocopter Using Onboard Visual and Inertial Sensing (J. Engel, J. Sturm, D. Cremers)
10  * In Proc. of the Workshop on Visual Control of Mobile Robots (ViCoMoR) at the IEEE/RJS International Conference on Intelligent Robot Systems (IROS), 2012.
11  *
12  *
13  *
14  *
15  */

24 DroneController::DroneController(void)
25 {
26  target = DronePosition(TooN::makeVector(0.0,0.0,0.0),0.0);
27  targetValid = false;
28  initialFlyed = false;
29  last_err[2] = 0;
30  lastTimeStamp = 0;
31  initialDistance = 1;
32  firstTargetDistance = 0.5;
33  secondTargetDistance = 1;
34  thirdTargetDistance = 1.5;
35  fourthTargetDistance = 2;
36  fifthTargetDistance = 2.5;
37  sixthTargetDistance = 3.0;
38 
39 
40  //write log data
41  logdata = fopen("logdataNow.txt","w+");
42  fputs("Time Current_x Current_y Current_z Current_yaw Current_dx Current_dy Current_dz Current_dyaw Current_yawoutput, Controller\n", logdata);
43 
44  hoverCommand.gaz = hoverCommand.pitch = hoverCommand.roll = hoverCommand.yaw = 0;
45 
46  mofsYaw = new MOFSModel::MOFSModel("/home/fu/FLCs/oldPIDyawEPFL.txt","/home/fu/FLCs/125rulesEPFL.txt" ,2,0,1);
47  //mofsRoll = new MOFSModel::MOFSModel("/home/fu/FLCs/CEroll.txt","/home/fu/FLCs/rulesCERoll.txt" ,2,0,1);
48 
49 
50 
51 
52 
53  node = NULL;
54 }

62 double angleFromTo2(double angle, double min, double sup)
63 {
64  while(angle < min) angle += 360;
65  while(angle >= sup) angle -= 360;
66  return angle;
67 }
68 
69 // generates and sends a new control command to the drone,
70 // based on the currently active command and the drone's position.
71 ControlCommand DroneController::update(tum_ardrone::filter_stateConstPtr state)
72 {
73  TooN::Vector<3> pose = TooN::makeVector(state->x, state->y, state->z);
74  double yaw = state->yaw;
75  TooN::Vector<4> speeds = TooN::makeVector(state->dx, state->dy, state->dz, state->dyaw);
76  ptamIsGood = state->ptamState == state->PTAM_BEST || state->ptamState == state->PTAM_GOOD || state->ptamState == state->PTAM_TOOKKF;
77  scaleAccuracy = state->scaleAccuracy;
78 
79  // calculate (new) errors.
80  TooN::Vector<4> new_err = TooN::makeVector(
81  target.pos[0] - pose[0],
82  target.pos[1] - pose[1],
83  target.pos[2] - pose[2],
84  target.yaw - yaw
85  );
86  // Yaw Target (Reference for See and Avoid (wall))
87  if(pose[1] > initialDistance) target.yaw = 90;
88 
89  // Now, set the target to finish the slalom
90 // if(pose[1] > 0 && pose[1] < firstTargetDistance) target.yaw = 30;
91 // else if(pose[1] > firstTargetDistance && pose[1] < secondTargetDistance) target.yaw = -30;
92 // else if(pose[1] < thirdTargetDistance && pose[1] > secondTargetDistance) target.yaw = 30; // cross the first pole
93 // else if(pose[1] < fourthTargetDistance && pose[1] > thirdTargetDistance) target.yaw = -30;
94 // else if(pose[1] < fifthTargetDistance && pose[1] > fourthTargetDistance) target.yaw = 30;
95 // else if(pose[1] < fifthTargetDistance && pose[1] > sixthTargetDistance) target.yaw = 0;
96 
97  sprintf(logLabel, " %f %f %f %f %f %f %f %f %f %f %f\n", getMS()/1000.0, state->x, state->y, state->z, state->yaw, state->dx, state->dy, state->dz, state->dyaw, outputYaw,lastSentControl.yaw);
98  fputs(logLabel, logdata);
99 
100  // yaw error needs special attention, it can always be pushed in between 180 and -180.
101  // this does not affect speeds and makes the drone always take the quickest rotation side.
102  new_err[3] = angleFromTo2(new_err[3],-180,180);
103  TooN::Vector<4> d_err = TooN::makeVector(-speeds[0], -speeds[1], -speeds[2], -speeds[3]);
104 
105 
106  if(targetValid)
107  calcControl(new_err, d_err, yaw);
108  else
109  {
110  lastSentControl = hoverCommand;
111  ROS_WARN("Warning: no valid target, sending hover.");
112  }
113 
114  last_err = new_err;
115  return lastSentControl;
116 }
117 
118 
119 void DroneController::setTarget(DronePosition newTarget)
120 {
121  target = newTarget;
122  target.yaw = angleFromTo2(target.yaw,-180,180);
123  targetSetAtClock = getMS()/1000.0;
124  targetNew = TooN::makeVector(1.0,1.0,1.0,1.0);
125  targetValid = true;
126  last_err = i_term = TooN::makeVector(0,0,0,0);
127 
128  char buf[200];
129  snprintf(buf,200,"New Target: xyz = %.3f, %.3f, %.3f, yaw=%.3f", target.pos[0],target.pos[1],target.pos[2],target.yaw);
130  ROS_INFO(buf);
131 
132  if(node != NULL)
133  node->publishCommand(std::string("u l ") + buf);
134 }

139  return target;

142 void DroneController::clearTarget()
143 {
144  targetValid = false;

147 void i_term_increase(double& i_term, double new_err, double cap)
148 {
149  if(new_err < 0 && i_term > 0)
150  i_term = std::max(0.0, i_term + 2.5 * new_err);
151  else if(new_err > 0 && i_term < 0)
152  i_term = std::min(0.0, i_term + 2.5 * new_err);
153  else
154  i_term += new_err;
155 
156 // if(i_term > cap) i_term = cap;
157 // if(i_term < -cap) i_term = -cap;
158 }
159 
160 void DroneController::calcControl(TooN::Vector<4> new_err, TooN::Vector<4> d_error, double yaw)
161 {
162  float agr = agressiveness;
163  if(!ptamIsGood) agr *= 0.75;
164  agr *= scaleAccuracy;
165 
166  double sec = getMS()/1000.0 - lastTimeStamp; lastTimeStamp = getMS()/1000.0;
167 
168  TooN::Vector<4> d_term = (new_err - last_err) / sec; // d-term:just differentiate
169  //TooN::Vector<4> d_term = d_error;
170  TooN::Vector<4> p_term = new_err; // p-term is error.
171 
172  // rotate error to drone CS, invert pitch
173  double yawRad = yaw * 2 * 3.141592 / 360;
174  d_term[0] = cos(yawRad)*d_error[0] - sin(yawRad)*d_error[1];
175  d_term[1] = - sin(yawRad)*d_error[0] - cos(yawRad)*d_error[1];
176 
177  p_term[0] = cos(yawRad)*new_err[0] - sin(yawRad)*new_err[1];
178  p_term[1] = - sin(yawRad)*new_err[0] - cos(yawRad)*new_err[1];
179 
180  // integrate & cap
181 
182  i_term_increase(i_term[3],new_err[3] * sec, 0.1f / Ki_rp+(1e-10));
183  i_term_increase(i_term[2],new_err[2] * sec, 0.2f / Ki_gaz);
184  i_term_increase(i_term[1],new_err[1] * sec, 0.1f / Ki_rp+(1e-10));
185  i_term_increase(i_term[0],new_err[0] * sec, 0.1f / Ki_rp+(1e-10));
186 
187  // kill integral term when first crossing target
188  // that is, targetNew is set, it was set at least 100ms ago, and err changed sign.
189 // for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
190 // if(targetNew[i] > 0.5 && getMS()/1000.0 - targetSetAtClock > 0.1 && last_err[i] * new_err[i] < 0)
191 // {
192 // i_term[i] = 0; targetNew[i] = 0;
193 // }
194 
195  //Fuzzy Controller for Yaw
196  inputYaw[0] = p_term[3] * 4.6739;
197  //if(p_term[3] > 0) d_term[3] = -d_term[3];
198  inputYaw[1] = d_term[3] * 0.03; //d_term should be the negative number, because it defines as negative number
199  inputYaw[2] = -i_term[3] * 0.5003;
200  outputYaw = mofsYaw->inputIrq(inputYaw, 0);
201  printf("Inputs:[%f, %f, %f], Output:%f\n", inputYaw[0], inputYaw[1], inputYaw[2], outputYaw);
202 
203 
204  // YAW
205  lastSentControl.yaw = outputYaw * 0.5;// Kp_yaw * p_term[3] + Kd_yaw * d_term[3]; // yaw can be translated directly
206  lastSentControl.yaw = std::min(max_yaw,std::max(-max_yaw,(double)(lastSentControl.yaw*agr)));
207 
208  //printf("Kp_yaw and Kd_yaw are %d and %d: \n",Kp_yaw,Kd_yaw);
209 
210  // RP
211  // calculate signals only based on d and p:
212  double cX_p = Kp_rp * p_term[0];
213  double cY_p = Kp_rp * p_term[1];
214  double cX_d = Kd_rp * d_term[0];
215  double cY_d = Kd_rp * d_term[1];
216  double cX_i = Ki_rp * i_term[0];
217  double cY_i = Ki_rp * i_term[1];
218 
219  //Fuzzy Controller for Roll
220  /*inputRoll[0] = 1.934 * p_term[0];
221  //if(p_term[0] > 0) d_term[0] = -d_term[0];
222  inputRoll[1] = 2.3774 * d_term[0] ; //d_term should be the negative number, becasue it defines as negative number
223  inputRoll[2] = 0.9905 * i_term[0] ;
224  float outputRoll = -mofsRoll->inputIrq(inputRoll, 0);
225  */
226  /*
227  // modulate non-linearely
228  float rp_mod_cut1 = 0.0;
229  float rp_mod_cut2 = 0.0;
230  float rp_mod_exp = 2;
231 
232  if(cX_p < rp_mod_cut1 && cX_p > 0)
233  cX_p = pow((float)cX_p,rp_mod_exp) / pow(rp_mod_cut1,rp_mod_exp-1);
234  else if(cX_p < rp_mod_cut2 && cX_p > 0)
235  cX_p = rp_mod_cut1 + pow((float)cX_p-rp_mod_cut1,1/rp_mod_exp) / pow(rp_mod_cut2-rp_mod_cut1,1/rp_mod_exp-1);
236 
237  if(cX_p > - rp_mod_cut1 && cX_p < 0)
238  cX_p = - pow(-(float)cX_p,rp_mod_exp) / pow(rp_mod_cut1,rp_mod_exp-1);
239  else if(cX_p > - rp_mod_cut2 && cX_p < 0)
240  cX_p = - (rp_mod_cut1 + pow(-(float)cX_p-rp_mod_cut1,1/rp_mod_exp) / pow(rp_mod_cut2-rp_mod_cut1,1/rp_mod_exp-1));
241 
242  if(cY_p < rp_mod_cut1 && cY_p > 0)
243  cY_p = pow((float)cY_p,rp_mod_exp) / pow(rp_mod_cut1,rp_mod_exp-1);
244  else if(cY_p < rp_mod_cut2 && cY_p > 0)
245  cY_p = rp_mod_cut1 + pow((float)cY_p-rp_mod_cut1,1/rp_mod_exp) / pow(rp_mod_cut2-rp_mod_cut1,1/rp_mod_exp-1);
246 
247  if(cY_p > - rp_mod_cut1 && cY_p < 0)
248  cY_p = - pow(-(float)cY_p,rp_mod_exp) / pow(rp_mod_cut1,rp_mod_exp-1);
249  else if(cY_p > - rp_mod_cut2 && cY_p < 0)
250  cY_p = - (rp_mod_cut1 + pow(-(float)cY_p-rp_mod_cut1,1/rp_mod_exp) / pow(rp_mod_cut2-rp_mod_cut1,1/rp_mod_exp-1));
251  */
252 
253 
254  lastSentControl.roll = cX_p + cX_d + cX_i;
255  lastSentControl.pitch = cY_p + cY_d + cY_i;
256 
257  // clip
258  lastSentControl.roll = 0; //std::min(max_rp,std::max(-max_rp,(double)(lastSentControl.roll*agr))) ;
259  lastSentControl.pitch = -0.08;//std::min(max_rp,std::max(-max_rp,(double)(lastSentControl.pitch*agr)));
260 
261 
262  // GAZ
263  double gazP = Kp_gaz * p_term[2];
264  double gazD = Kd_gaz * d_term[2];
265  double gazI = Ki_gaz * i_term[2];
266 
267 
268  lastSentControl.gaz = std::min(max_gaz_rise/rise_fac,std::max(max_gaz_drop, gazP + gazD + gazI));
269  if(lastSentControl.gaz > 0) lastSentControl.gaz *= rise_fac;
270 
271  logInfo = TooN::makeVector(
272  Kp_rp * p_term[0], Kp_rp * p_term[1], gazP, Kp_yaw * p_term[3],
273  Kd_rp * d_term[0], Kd_rp * d_term[1], gazD, Kd_yaw * d_term[3],
274  Ki_rp * i_term[0], Ki_rp * i_term[1], gazI, Ki_yaw * i_term[3],
275  lastSentControl.roll, lastSentControl.pitch, lastSentControl.gaz, lastSentControl.yaw,
276  lastSentControl.roll, lastSentControl.pitch, lastSentControl.gaz, lastSentControl.yaw,
277  new_err[0],new_err[1],new_err[2],new_err[3],
278  target.pos[0],target.pos[1],target.pos[2],target.yaw
279  );
280 
281 }
